title.value: Сроки созревания Lonicera caerulea L. в условиях Беларуси
Maturation period of Lonicera caerulea L. in Belarus

person.name: Shalkevich, M.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Fruit Growing

abstract.value: The study results of maturing terms of 46 blue honeysuckle (Lonicera caerulea L.) cultivars of various genetic and geographical origin in Belarus conditions are presented in the article. Collection study was performed in 2003-2011. On the basis of accumulation of effective temperatures sum (above +5 deg C) groups of blue honeysuckle cultivars were defined by maturing terms: early (average value of effective temperatures sum 198,7 +/- 6 deg C), average (227,5 +/- 4 deg C) and late (256,0 +/- 8 deg C). Duration of maturing period on the average for research years made 8 – 14 days for early cultivars, 8 – 10 days – for average ones, 10 – 13 days – for late ones. The received results should be considered at cultivars selection for industrial plantings and personal plots.
